title: New WNMU fitness center opens Sept. 21
content:
An open house for the new pool and fitness center at WNMU was held on Aug. 21. The facility is set to open on Sept. 21. Mary Alice Murphy - Sun-News SILVER CITY >> Western New Mexico University has announced Sept.
